actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A resolution disapproving proposed deferral of budget authority No. D78-19 in the amount of $12 million for Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, Office of Territory Affairs, Department of the Interior, for construction of an airport in the Korea District of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.

summary.text: Disapproves proposed budget deferral D78-19 which concerns construction of an airport in the Korea District of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving proposed deferral of budget authority No. D78-19 in the amount of $12 million for Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, Office of Territory Affairs, Department of the Interior, for construction of an airport in the Korea District of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
